meanings.definition: Frostnip: a superficial freezing of the skin and tissues due to exposure to cold temperatures.
meanings.sent1: After playing in the snow without gloves, she developed frostnip on her fingers.
meanings.sent2: The doctor quickly treated the frostnip on the child's cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The snowman's nose got frostnip from being out in the cold all night.
meanings.sent4: The frostnip on the leaves made them look like delicate ice sculptures.
meanings.sent5: The frostnip on the pond's surface warned of the approaching winter chill.
